name: ttgds
params: class c0, class c1, class c2

body.origin:
|- wceq(c0, cfv(cds, c1))
-| wceq(c0, cfv(cds, c2))
-| wceq(cfv(cds, c2), cfv(cds, c1))
body.pretty:
⊢ c0 =(dist ` c1)
⊣ c0 =(dist ` c2)
⊣ (dist ` c2)=(dist ` c1)

cumulated.origin:
|- wceq(c0, cfv(cds, c1))
-| wceq(c0, cfv(cds, c2))
-| wceq(cfv(cds, c2), cfv(cds, c1))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ c0 =(dist ` c1)
⊣ c0 =(dist ` c2)
⊣ (dist ` c2)=(dist ` c1)

body.origin:
|- wceq(cfv(cds, c2), cfv(cds, c1))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(cttg, c2))
-| wceq(cds, cslot(cdc(nat1, nat2)))
-| wcel(cdc(nat1, nat2), cn)
-| wbr(cdc(nat1, nat2), clt, cdc(nat1, nat6))
body.pretty:
⊢ (dist ` c2)=(dist ` c1)
⊣ c1 =(toTG ` c2)
⊣ dist = Slot(cdc(1, 2))
⊣ cdc(1, 2)∈ ℕ
⊣ cdc(1, 2)[<]cdc(1, 6)

cumulated.origin:
|- wceq(c0, cfv(cds, c1))
-| wceq(c0, cfv(cds, c2))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(cttg, c2))
-| wceq(cds, cslot(cdc(nat1, nat2)))
-| wcel(cdc(nat1, nat2), cn)
-| wbr(cdc(nat1, nat2), clt, cdc(nat1, nat6))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ c0 =(dist ` c1)
⊣ c0 =(dist ` c2)
⊣ c1 =(toTG ` c2)
⊣ dist = Slot(cdc(1, 2))
⊣ cdc(1, 2)∈ ℕ
⊣ cdc(1, 2)[<]cdc(1, 6)

cumulated.origin:
|- wceq(c0, cfv(cds, c1))
-| wceq(c0, cfv(cds, c2))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(cttg, c2))
-| wcel(cdc(nat1, nat2), cn)
-| wbr(cdc(nat1, nat2), clt, cdc(nat1, nat6))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ c0 =(dist ` c1)
⊣ c0 =(dist ` c2)
⊣ c1 =(toTG ` c2)
⊣ cdc(1, 2)∈ ℕ
⊣ cdc(1, 2)[<]cdc(1, 6)

body.origin:
|- wcel(cdc(nat1, nat2), cn)
-| wcel(nat1, cn0)
-| wcel(nat2, cn)

cumulated.origin:
|- wceq(c0, cfv(cds, c1))
-| wceq(c0, cfv(cds, c2))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(cttg, c2))
-| wbr(cdc(nat1, nat2), clt, cdc(nat1, nat6))
-| wcel(nat1, cn0)
-| wcel(nat2, cn)

|- wceq(c0, cfv(cds, c1))
-| wceq(c0, cfv(cds, c2))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(cttg, c2))
-| wbr(cdc(nat1, nat2), clt, cdc(nat1, nat6))
-| wcel(nat1, cn0)

body.origin:
|- wbr(cdc(nat1, nat2), clt, cdc(nat1, nat6))
-| wcel(nat1, cn0)
-| wcel(nat2, cn0)
-| wcel(nat6, cn)
-| wbr(nat2, clt, nat6)

cumulated.origin:
|- wceq(c0, cfv(cds, c1))
-| wceq(c0, cfv(cds, c2))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(cttg, c2))
-| wcel(nat1, cn0)
-| wcel(nat2, cn0)
-| wcel(nat6, cn)
-| wbr(nat2, clt, nat6)

|- wceq(c0, cfv(cds, c1))
-| wceq(c0, cfv(cds, c2))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(cttg, c2))
-| wcel(nat2, cn0)
-| wcel(nat6, cn)
-| wbr(nat2, clt, nat6)

|- wceq(c0, cfv(cds, c1))
-| wceq(c0, cfv(cds, c2))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(cttg, c2))
-| wcel(nat6, cn)
-| wbr(nat2, clt, nat6)

|- wceq(c0, cfv(cds, c1))
-| wceq(c0, cfv(cds, c2))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(cttg, c2))
-| wbr(nat2, clt, nat6)
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ c0 =(dist ` c1)
⊣ c0 =(dist ` c2)
⊣ c1 =(toTG ` c2)
⊣ 2[<]6

cumulated.origin:
|- wceq(c0, cfv(cds, c1))
-| wceq(c0, cfv(cds, c2))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(cttg, c2))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ c0 =(dist ` c1)
⊣ c0 =(dist ` c2)
⊣ c1 =(toTG ` c2)

comment: The metric of a subcomplex Hilbert space augmented with betweenness. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 25-Mar-2019.)
